_aChangeLog.text: Adjusted the drop range of Snowflower's Drop Checker
Added a console message when Snowflower gets "dropped".
Fixed vents in Elevator 1 Area breaking too early due to a trigger being too forward.

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
Stripper Config can be found at:
https://github.com/Pasas1345/Pasas1345Maps-Configs/blob/main/stripper/ze_snowflower_laboratory_v1.cfg

_sText:
"Sometimes, laboratories have good things, like for example, a Snowflower, a mythical flower that freezes anything around it, except for the holder. Seems like that laboratory holding and researching the Snowflower has been abandoned by its team, and guess what, we need that Snowflower. Trust us, we won't use it for weapons. Just to study it. So we need you to get it."

-Aether Supplies
Map by Pasas1345
Music List:
Rabi-Ribi - Exotic Laboratory
Kevin Penkin - GAMESTART
Rabi-Ribi - Plan B
Kevin Penkin - Autoroll
Another snowy map. With the side of caves, vents and an item that can sabotage your team. Hope you enjoy!
Includes
  • A map with 1 checkpoint (which you can go to only once)
  • Vents, lots of vents.
  • NPCs.
  • An quest item that can sabotage your teammates.
Hope you enjoy the map!

(Currently there is a stripper fix included in the zip file to fix a bug with the Quest Item drop check system. You don't need this to fully play the map though)
